reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: ICI SYKE/GAFRD assessment of effects of dredging

description.narrative: The ICI- project of the Finnish Environment Institute SYKE and the Egyptian partner General Authority for Fish Resources Development GAFRD aims at the improved capacity of GAFRD to monitor the water quality of Lake Manzala and its natural resources in coll aboration with other relevant organisations. The expected results of the project are to 1) plan dredging operations and prepare an Environmental Impact Assessment plan 2) prepare guidelines for sustainable dredging and 3) prepare a plan for Lake Manzala jo int operational monitoring and data management system and prepare recommendations for its implementation. In the long term the project aims at improved environmental status of Lake Manzala for sustainable fish production thus also supporting the livelihood of the local population.
